plot: Siu Suen and Chi Kit, a young couple who fall deeply in love and swear to be together forever. However, in the need for money to survive, Chi Kit decides to become a rich woman's gigolo.
title: Mo gui tian shi
plot_es: Siu Suen and Chi Kit, a young couple who fall deeply in love and swear to be together forever. However, in the need for money to survive, Chi Kit decides to become a rich woman's gigolo.
plot_en: Siu Suen and Chi Kit, a young couple who fall deeply in love and swear to be together forever. However, in the need for money to survive, Chi Kit decides to become a rich woman's gigolo.
